skins.selfIntroduction: I am Suruga, Kii-class battleship number three. I sadly wasn't constructed in time for that infamous war... It seems some threads of fate have led me to join this fleet, one I shall devote all my soul to. It is my pleasure to serve you.
skins.acquisition: Battleship Suruga, reporting for duty. It would seem that some threads of fate connect me to this port... No, don't mind my rambling. Please disregard that.
skins.login: Let's focus our attention on our work today. Don't be afraid to ask for my help, should you need it.
skins.details: I've noticed those Priority ships are strikingly individualisC Pardon, I mean they have striking personalities. Not that I'm jealous, or anything of the sort.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I believe I'm better suited for a desk job where I can analyze data and draft new plans. The reason being my strengths lie in quickly reading, memorizing, and writing documents.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Reckless hotheads and I don't get along particularly well. So I've learned first-hand through bad experiences with a certain someone... That is not to say I hate those kinds of people, however.
skins.secretaryIdle3: I'm deeply grateful that you've elected me as your secretary. However, I would absolutely welcome the addition of more people to the office, as we're rather short-staffed with just me here.
skins.secretaryIdle4: I'm not a fan of battling, but if anyone picks a fight with me, then a fight they'll get. We were made to wage war, and so that is our responsibility.
skins.secretaryIdle5: Life is so peaceful at this port. For that, we can thank the many girls here who I don't hold as much as a candle to.
skins.secretaryTouch: I will do as you order me to, Commander.
skins.secretaryHeadpat: I hope my horns were left alone... Phew, they were... Err, no! Never mind I said anything!

skins.shipDescription: Good morning, Commander. Everyone else seems to be dressed up on this day of celebration, so this shouldn't be a problem, right?
skins.acquisition: Good morning, Commander. Everyone else seems to be dressed up on this day of celebration, so this shouldn't be a problem, right?
skins.login: Good morning, Commander. What do you say we take this day off and relax?
skins.details: I'm not much of a drinker, but I should at least have a little bit of social sake. What will you have, Commander? I could get you something alcohol-free right away.
skins.secretaryIdle1: You got this, Team Red! Mop the floor with those Team White clowns! ...Do you want to stay and watch TV with me, Commander? This match is definitely worth watching.
skins.secretaryIdle2: I always end up oversleeping on the day after the holiday's over... *Sigh*... Me dropping the ball when it really matters is not funny at all.
skins.secretaryIdle3: "Treasure every moment of peace you get," as someone once said. We're only simple "people", after all.
skins.secretaryTouch: I hardly ever get the chance to put this outfit on. Aren't you glad to see me wearing it, Commander? Hahaha~
skins.secretaryHeadpat: Y-you don't need to stare at me...
